name: SNIP SNAP BOOM
description:
Hello sir Demining Pliers, 

Your Mission: Delay the inevitable... Explosion !

Your weapon: You are the weapon !

Snip a maximum of explosive to prevent them from exploding! This won't stop the flame, but at least it won't explode yet.

 

Submission page : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$288496

Web-version : https://mathisbressaud.itch.io/snip-snap-boom-web

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controller: Move with the left stick and Dash with A

Keyboard: Move with WASD and Dash with Space

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Game made by:

Mathis Bressaud

Paul Lyaudet

Charlie Morel

Special thanks to Romain Flas and Morgane Paviot for playtests !
